hero.title: Mert Batut | Frontend Developer
hero.description: I am a Frontend Developer passionate about creating modern and scalable frontend solutions. Combining user-centric designs with functionality to deliver superior user experiences.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Projects showcasing my experience and skills
projects.notFoundDesc: There are no projects in this category yet. Please choose another category or check back later.
projects.sampleProject1Desc: A fully interactive 3D portfolio web application created using ThreeJS and React. Users can navigate between projects in 3D.
projects.sampleProject2Desc: A mobile application where you can view furniture in your home using augmented reality technology. View with real dimensions and materials.
projects.sampleProject3Desc: A dashboard application that visualizes large data sets with interactive charts, maps, and animated indicators.

profile.description: Get to know me and my professional journey.
profile.aboutDesc: I specialize in creating user-friendly interfaces using React, React Native, and modern JavaScript libraries. I focus on building responsive and high-performance web applications.
profile.adaptation: Quick learning and adaptation to new technologies
profile.codeQuality: Focus on code quality and scalability
profile.recentWork: Developing modern and interactive interfaces using React, React Native, and Redux. Working on improving user experience and optimizing application performance.
profile.prevWork: Developed user-friendly interfaces using Angular, implemented API integrations, and worked on performance optimization. Contributed to project planning processes using agile methodology.

footer.title: Send me a message!
footer.description: Do you have a question or suggestion, or do you just want to say hello?
